body: Listed artist Lionel Stern lived and was active in New York, being known for precise urban views, figure, and graphic design work.  His work has been sold through venues such as Trinity International Auctions, Weschler’s and Christie’s East.  This breath taking view of the Statue of Liberty from the Hudson Bay, with tugboats, gulls, and sunlight on the water is absolutely beautiful.
dimensions: Oil on canvas, 8 x 10 inches / Signed lower right

title: Statue of Liberty
